code: import axios from'axios';const API_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:8080/api';const enrollmentService={async enrollStudent(studentId,courseId){const response=await axios.post("".concat(API_URL,"/enrollments/enroll"),null,{params:{studentId,courseId}});return response.data;},async getEnrollmentsByStudent(studentId){const response=await axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/enrollments/student/").concat(studentId));return response.data;},async getEnrollmentsByCourse(courseId){const response=await axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/enrollments/course/").concat(courseId));return response.data;},async updateGrade(enrollmentId,grade,score){const response=await axios.put("".concat(API_URL,"/enrollments/").concat(enrollmentId,"/grade"),null,{params:{grade,score}});return response.data;},async removeEnrollment(enrollmentId){const response=await axios.delete("".concat(API_URL,"/enrollments/").concat(enrollmentId));return response.data;}};export default enrollmentService;
